name: Symbiosis (itch) (Moontail)
description:
Symbiosis is a coop local game where you need to repair an entity who's been separated.

The goal is to reproduce a synchronized movement sequence between the players, in 4 different worlds. each one represent one of the 4 main emotions (Joy,Anger,Sadness,Fear) and each one contains 2 levels (Total of 8 levels).

This game was done during the Global Game Jam 2020.

[Two controllers are required to play (PS4/Xbox/Switch Pro Gamepads)]

Programmer/Game Designer

Killian Beguerie : https://stapz33.itch.io/
